item.title: Categories
item.description: Categories # Assignments (85%) # We have 4 big assignments in total (subject to change). Visit this course’s Gradescope site for the assignment documents. See the schedule table above for deliverable due dates. [20%] HW1: Week 1 to Week 3 topics [20%] HW2: Week 4 to Week 7 topics [20%] HW3: Week 8 to Week 10 topics [25%] HW4: Week 11 to end. We do not release solutions for homework.
